title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Productive Failure for Enhancing Collaborative Problem-Solving (CPS) Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and team project experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can develop collaborative strategies to solve scientific problems by incorporating diverse team members' opinions.
Learners can analyze errors occurring in the problem-solving process and derive improvement plans through productive failure experiences.
Learners are equipped with the ability to document and evaluate team collaboration processes using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
